wordpressPost.title: Healthy Start Challenge
wordpressPost.content:
Prepping for the new year? Join the Stryde Healthy Start Challenge! It will begin on January 1st, 2021 and end on January 31st, 2021. We are encouraging and challenging you to start 2021 in “Stryde” by completing 12 Stryde rides in the first month of the year.

12 rides? That’s nothing. You’ve got this!

Rules:

⚡️ You must enter the challenge by completing this form by Sunday, January 10th, 2021 at 12 PM EST in order for your rides to count.

⚡️ After each ride, successfully fill out the short “yes” or “no” survey that asks “Did you enjoy this class?” This is how we will see your completed rides throughout the month.

⚡️ Follow us on social media and post at least 1 Instagram story, 1 Instagram post, or 1 Facebook post once you have completed a ride you love. Please remember to tag @strydebike and to use #StrydeHealthyStartChallenge so we can follow along with you every pedal stroke of the way.

Prizes:

⚡️ Completion of 12 or more rides AND you follow, post and tag us on social media at least once – Receive a Stryde Healthy Start Challenge t-shirt.

⚡️ Completion of 12 or more rides AND you follow, post and tag us on social media multiple times – Be entered to win a Zoom ride experience with a Stryde instructor of your choice, invite up to 10 friends to join and help create the playlist. The more times you post, the better your chances are!

For questions regarding the Healthy Start Challenge, please email us at challenges@strydebike.com.
